SleepPassScene_Content_Desc:
You get one sleep point for each point
earned in your sleep score.
SleepPassScene_Content_Desc_2:
You get one sleep point for each point earned
in your sleep score, plus a bonus 100 sleep
points each day you track a sleep session.
SleepPassSceneNormalPassInfoPopup_Desc:
Get one sleep point for each point earned in
your sleep score (max: 100 points per day)
SleepPassSceneNormalPassInfoPopup_Desc_2: View up to 30 days of past sleep data
SleepPassSceneNormalPassInfoCampaign: You Can Try for Two Weeks at No Cost!
SleepPassSceneSleepPointButton_Text:
・ You get one sleep point for each
    point earned in your sleep score
    whenever you track your sleep
・ With an active Premium Pass, you
    will get an extra 100 points each
    day that you track sleep
・ You will also get a bonus 1,000
    sleep points once a month while
    you have an active Premium Pass
SleepPassScene_FreeTime_Text_Compare:
・�毿ＷThe 14-day no-cost trial is only available to new
   Premium Pass subscribers.��＀
・When you first sign up for a Premium Pass, you will
   be able to use it at no cost for the first 14 days.
・The quarterly loyalty rewards that Premium Pass
   holders are eligible for are given out once every
   three months.
・�毿ＷThe no-cost trial period does not count toward
   your subscription streak.��＀
・If you cancel your plan or are switched back to a
   Regular Pass due to a payment failure or other
   issue, it will be considered an interruption of your
   streak, and your progress toward your loyalty
   rewards will be reset.
・If you choose to cancel your plan before it has
   reached its renewal date, your Premium Pass will
   still be active until the expiration date.
・If you wish to purchase a new Premium Pass after
   moving to a device on a new platform, please
   cancel your plan on the previous platform first.
・For more information on changing plans, canceling
   your plan, or transferring data to new devices,
   please refer to the “Support Website” option in the
   “Settings and More” section of the Main Menu.
SleepPassScene_FreeTime_Text_iOS:
To iOS users:

�毿ＷIf your AppIe ID has already been used for a trial, you��＀
�毿Ｗwill no longer be eligible for a 14-day no-cost��＀
�毿Ｗtrial period.��＀

After completing the 14-day no-cost trial, your plan
will automatically be converted to a paid Premium
Pass plan that renews automatically.

If you want to terminate your plan, please cancel
the automatic renewal at least 24 hours before the
expiration date of your Premium Pass.

To confirm the expiration date of your pass, open the
Settings app on your device, tap on your Apple ID,
then tap Subscriptions.
NOTE: These options may appear differently on your
device, depending on your OS version.

For more information on payment periods and methods,
canceling subscriptions, reimbursement options, and
more, please refer to the “Support Website” option in
the “Settings and More” section of the Main Menu.
SleepPassScene_FreeTime_Text_Android:
To Android users:

�毿ＷIf your Google Account has already been used for a
trial, you will no longer be eligible for a 14-day
no-cost trial period.��＀

After completing the 14-day no-cost trial, your plan
will automatically be converted to a paid Premium
Pass plan that renews automatically.

If you want to terminate your plan, please cancel the
automatic renewal at least 24 hours before the
expiration date of your Premium Pass.

To confirm the expiration date of your pass, open
the Play Store, tap on your profile icon, then select
Payments & Subscriptions. You should find the
information under Subscriptions.

For more information on payment periods and methods,
canceling subscriptions, reimbursement options, and
more, please refer to the “Support Website” option in
the “Settings and More” section of the Main Menu.

SleepPassScene_Content_PremiumPassConten: Select Plan
Details
Benefit #1

View �毿Ｗunlimited��＀ sleep data
records and statistics

With a Regular Pass, you can only view your
data from the past 30 days. If you have a
Premium Pass, you are able to review all
past data without limit.

All past data is saved on the server,
regardless of your current pass status,
so you’ll get access to all your records
whenever you purchase a Premium Pass.
Benefit #2

Daily Bonus Biscuit upgraded
to a �毿ＷPremium Bonus Biscuit��＀

Instead of a regular Bonus Biscuit, you’ll
get a Premium Bonus Biscuit each day
at snack time.

A Premium Bonus Biscuit increases a
Pokémon’s friendship points by 4.
Benefit #3

Receive a bonus �毿Ｗ100 sleep points
��＀each day that you track sleep

Each day that you track your sleep, you
can get 100 extra sleep points.

These bonus sleep points will be awarded
just once a day—so if you track more than
one sleep session in day, you will only get
bonus sleep points for the first one.
Benefit #4

Gain access to the �毿ＷPremium Exchange
��＀for exchanging your sleep points

You can use the Premium Exchange when
exchanging sleep points for items.

The item lineup in the Premium Exchange
will change monthly.
Benefit #5

Monthly gifts of a �毿ＷGood Camp
Ticket ��＀and �毿Ｗ1,000 sleep points��＀

With an active Premium Pass, you can
receive gifts of a Good Camp Ticket and
1,000 sleep points once per month.

Check the main Sleep Pass screen to see
when your next monthly gifts will arrive.
Benefit #6

Additional �毿Ｗlavish rewards��＀
every three months

Every three months that you stay
subscribed to a Premium Pass, you’ll
get a Handy Candy L, a Sub Skill Seed,
and a Dream Cluster M.
(The no-cost trial period does not count
toward your subscription streak.)

Tap the Loyalty Rewards button to see
when your next quarterly reward is due.
Benefit #7

Unlock a �毿Ｗdiary��＀ where you can
write notes on your sleep

You can write down all sorts of things in a
diary along with your sleep data. Try to jot
down observations and things you notice
about your sleep, how you felt when you
woke up, and more.

You can use up to 200 characters when
writing entries in your sleep diary.
SleepPassScene_PlanChoice_Text_1:
If you choose to purchase a Premium Pass,
you will be automatically charged upon the
renewal date of your chosen plan.
SleepPassScene_PlanChoice_Text_2:
The first time you purchase a pass, you
won’t be charged for the first 14 days.
If you want to avoid being charged,
be sure to cancel at least 24 hours before
the end of this trial period.
